bill.constitutionalAuthorityStatementText: [Congressional Record Volume 165, Number 90 (Thursday, May 30, 2019)][House]From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]By Ms. SCHRIER:H.R. 3049.Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuantto the following:Article I[Page H4181]

item.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.

summary.text:
School Nutrition Transparency for Healthy Kids Act of 2019

This bill requires that each state educational agency annually publish on the Department of Agriculture website data on the compliance of school food authorities with respect to nutritional requirements, including

  • the number of school food authorities in compliance with such requirements, disaggregated by state;
  • the total number of such authorities in each state; and
  • the percentage of such authorities in compliance with such requirements, disaggregated by state.

bill.title: School Nutrition Transparency for Healthy Kids Act of 2019

item.title: School Nutrition Transparency for Healthy Kids Act of 2019
To ensure public disclosure of nutrition standards compliance by school food authorities, and for other purposes.
School Nutrition Transparency for Healthy Kids Act of 2019

latestAction.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.

dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.
dublinCore.dc:contributor: Congressional Research Service, Library of Congress
dublinCore.dc:description: This file contains bill summaries and statuses for federal legislation. A bill summary describes the most significant provisions of a piece of legislation and details the effects the legislative text may have on current law and federal programs. Bill summaries are authored by the Congressional Research Service (CRS) of the Library of Congress. As stated in Public Law 91-510 (2 USC 166 (d)(6)), one of the duties of CRS is "to prepare summaries and digests of bills and resolutions of a public general nature introduced in the Senate or House of Representatives". For more information, refer to the User Guide that accompanies this file.
